item.title: Kalki 2898 AD worldwide box office collection : ₹1000 Crore
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The movie, starring Prabhas, Amitabh Bachchan, Deepika Padukone, and Kamal Haasan, has been praised for its depiction of Mahabharata and technical excellence.“Kalki 2898 AD” has been a major success at the box office since its release on June 27, 2024. As of now, it has grossed ₹880 crore worldwide. The movie has emerged as the…
item.content:encoded:
The movie, starring Prabhas, Amitabh Bachchan, Deepika Padukone, and Kamal Haasan, has been praised for its depiction of Mahabharata and technical excellence.
“Kalki 2898 AD” has been a major success at the box office since its release on June 27, 2024. As of now, it has grossed ₹880 crore worldwide. The movie has emerged as the most successful Indian film of 2024.

“Kalki 2898 AD,” a highly anticipated Indian Telugu-language epic science fiction film directed by Nag Ashwin, has been making waves since its release. Featuring an ensemble cast that includes Amitabh Bachchan, Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, and Kamal Haasan, the film is set in a post-apocalyptic world in the year 2898 AD and draws inspiration from Hindu scriptures.

“Kalki 2898 AD,” a high-budget sci-fi epic directed by Nag Ashwin, has been making waves with its massive box office performance and critical acclaim. The film, starring Prabhas, Amitabh Bachchan, Deepika Padukone, and Kamal Haasan, has surpassed ₹950 crore worldwide​​. In North America alone, it set a record by grossing $4 million in pre-sales and selling over 100,000 premiere tickets​​.

The movie, set in a futuristic world, features Prabhas as Bhairava, a bounty hunter, and Deepika Padukone as SUM-80. The ensemble cast also includes Disha Patani, Rajendra Prasad, and Saswata Chatterjee​.

Regarding its digital release, the OTT release of “Kalki 2898 AD” has been delayed to allow the film a longer theatrical run. Initially planned for late July, it will now be available on Amazon Prime and Netflix from mid-September​​.

item.title: Virat Kohli Net Worth 2024
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Virat Kohli, the Indian cricketing maestro, has not only made headlines for his exceptional performances on the field but also for his impressive earnings off it. Known for his aggressive batting style and charismatic leadership, Kohli has built a brand that extends far beyond cricket. This blog delves into the various facets of Virat Kohli’s…
item.content:encoded:
Virat Kohli, the Indian cricketing maestro, has not only made headlines for his exceptional performances on the field but also for his impressive earnings off it. Known for his aggressive batting style and charismatic leadership, Kohli has built a brand that extends far beyond cricket. This blog delves into the various facets of Virat Kohli’s net worth, highlighting his cricketing income, endorsements, business ventures, and assets.

Cricketing Career Earnings

Virat Kohli’s primary source of income is, unsurprisingly, his cricketing career. As one of the top players in the world, he earns a substantial amount from his contracts with the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) and the Indian Premier League (IPL).

  1. BCCI Contracts: As a Grade A+ player, Kohli earns a significant annual salary from the BCCI. This contract includes match fees for Test, ODI, and T20I matches, which contribute considerably to his earnings.
  2. IPL Contracts: Kohli’s association with the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) in the IPL has been highly lucrative. Over the years, he has been one of the highest-paid players in the league, earning millions through his contracts and performance bonuses.

Endorsements and Brand Deals

Virat Kohli is one of the most marketable athletes globally, with a vast array of endorsement deals. His association with several high-profile brands has greatly amplified his net worth.

  1. Sports Brands: Kohli has long-standing deals with sportswear giants like Puma and Adidas, which are among his most lucrative endorsements.
  2. Consumer Goods: Brands like Pepsi, Audi, and MRF have also partnered with Kohli, leveraging his massive popularity to enhance their market presence.
  3. Technology and Lifestyle: Kohli’s endorsement portfolio includes tech brands like Google and lifestyle brands such as Tissot, adding diversity to his income sources.

Business Ventures

Kohli’s entrepreneurial spirit has led him to invest in various business ventures, further boosting his financial portfolio.

  1. Wrogn: Co-owning the fashion brand Wrogn, Kohli has successfully ventured into the fashion industry. The brand offers trendy and affordable clothing, appealing to the youth demographic.
  2. One8: In collaboration with Puma, Kohli launched the One8 brand, which offers a range of sports and lifestyle products. This venture has seen significant success, contributing to his overall net worth.
  3. Fitness Ventures: Kohli’s passion for fitness led him to invest in gyms and fitness centers under the brand Chisel. This venture aligns with his personal brand and promotes a healthy lifestyle.

Real Estate and Luxury Assets

Kohli’s earnings have enabled him to invest in prime real estate and luxury assets, adding to his wealth.

  1. Properties: Kohli owns luxurious properties in Mumbai and Gurgaon, which are valued in crores. These properties feature state-of-the-art amenities and reflect his opulent lifestyle.
  2. Cars and Accessories: Known for his love for luxury cars, Kohli’s garage boasts brands like Audi, Bentley, and Lamborghini. His collection of high-end watches and accessories also signifies his lavish taste.

Philanthropy

Despite his enormous wealth, Kohli is known for his philanthropic efforts. Through the Virat Kohli Foundation, he supports various causes, including education and healthcare for underprivileged children. His charitable endeavors demonstrate his commitment to giving back to society.

Conclusion

Virat Kohli’s net worth is a testament to his hard work, talent, and business acumen. From his cricketing earnings to his diverse endorsements and successful business ventures, Kohli has built a financial empire that places him among the wealthiest athletes globally. As he continues to excel on and off the field, his net worth is expected to grow, solidifying his legacy as not only a cricketing legend but also a shrewd entrepreneur and philanthropist.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan: The King of Bollywood and His Astounding Net Worth
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: hah Rukh Khan, often referred to as the “King of Bollywood,” has captivated audiences worldwide with his charismatic performances, romantic roles, and unparalleled talent. Over the course of his illustrious career, he has become a global icon, earning not only fame but also a substantial fortune. This blog delves into the life, career, and net…
item.content:encoded:
hah Rukh Khan, often referred to as the “King of Bollywood,” has captivated audiences worldwide with his charismatic performances, romantic roles, and unparalleled talent. Over the course of his illustrious career, he has become a global icon, earning not only fame but also a substantial fortune. This blog delves into the life, career, and net worth of Shah Rukh Khan, the undisputed Badshah of Bollywood.

Early Life and Struggles

Born on November 2, 1965, in New Delhi, India, Shah Rukh Khan’s journey to stardom was far from easy. After losing his parents at a young age, he moved to Mumbai to pursue a career in acting. He started his career with appearances in television serials like “Fauji” and “Circus,” where his talent and screen presence quickly garnered attention.

Breakthrough and Rise to Stardom

Shah Rukh Khan’s Bollywood debut came in 1992 with the film “Deewana,” which was an instant success. His breakthrough role as a romantic hero came with “Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge” (1995), a film that became a cultural phenomenon and is still celebrated today. The success of this film established Shah Rukh as the quintessential romantic hero of Indian cinema.

A Career of Iconic Films

Throughout the 1990s and 2000s, Shah Rukh Khan delivered a string of blockbuster hits, including “Dil To Pagal Hai” (1997), “Kuch Kuch Hota Hai” (1998), “Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham” (2001), and “Kal Ho Naa Ho” (2003). His versatility allowed him to excel in various genres, from intense dramas like “Swades” (2004) and “Chak De! India” (2007) to action-packed thrillers like “Don” (2006) and its sequel “Don 2” (2011).

Entrepreneurial Ventures

Beyond acting, Shah Rukh Khan is a successful entrepreneur. He co-owns the production company Red Chillies Entertainment, which has produced numerous successful films and ventured into visual effects. He also owns the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR), a franchise in the Indian Premier League (IPL), which has won multiple championships under his ownership.

Philanthropy and Humanitarian Efforts

Shah Rukh Khan is deeply involved in philanthropic activities. He supports various causes, including child health and education, women’s empowerment, and disaster relief. He has also been honored with numerous awards for his humanitarian work, including the prestigious UNESCO Pyramide con Marni award in 2011.

Shah Rukh Khan’s Net Worth

As of 2024, Shah Rukh Khan’s net worth is estimated to be around $770 million, making him one of the wealthiest actors in the world. His income is derived from multiple sources, including acting fees, brand endorsements, and his business ventures. Shah Rukh charges around $20-30 million per film and commands top dollar for his endorsements, partnering with brands like Pepsi, Hyundai, and Nokia.

Luxurious Lifestyle and Assets

Shah Rukh Khan’s wealth is reflected in his luxurious lifestyle. He owns the iconic Mannat mansion in Mumbai, a multi-story villa that is a tourist attraction in its own right. He also has properties in Dubai and London, including a signature villa on the Palm Jumeirah in Dubai. His car collection boasts high-end brands like BMW, Audi, and Bentley.

Future Projects

Even after three decades in the industry, Shah Rukh Khan shows no signs of slowing down. He continues to take on diverse and challenging roles, and fans eagerly anticipate his upcoming projects. His commitment to cinema and his ability to reinvent himself have kept him relevant and adored by audiences worldwide.

Conclusion

Shah Rukh Khan’s journey from a young boy in Delhi to the King of Bollywood is a tale of perseverance, talent, and relentless hard work. With a net worth of $770 million, he stands as one of the richest actors globally, a testament to his success and influence. His contributions to cinema, philanthropy, and business make him a true icon, and his legacy will continue to inspire generations to come.

item.title: Salman Khan: A Glimpse into the Life and Net Worth of Bollywood’s Superstar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Salman Khan, one of Bollywood’s most iconic and beloved actors, has been a major force in the Indian film industry for over three decades. His journey from a young actor in the late 1980s to a megastar in the 21st century is nothing short of remarkable. This blog takes a closer look at the life,…
item.content:encoded:
Salman Khan, one of Bollywood’s most iconic and beloved actors, has been a major force in the Indian film industry for over three decades. His journey from a young actor in the late 1980s to a megastar in the 21st century is nothing short of remarkable. This blog takes a closer look at the life, career, and net worth of this legendary actor.

Early Life and Career Beginnings

Born on December 27, 1965, in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India, Salman Khan hails from a prominent Bollywood family. His father, Salim Khan, is a renowned screenwriter, and his brothers, Arbaaz Khan and Sohail Khan, are also actors and filmmakers. Salman made his acting debut in 1988 with a supporting role in the film “Biwi Ho To Aisi.” However, it was his performance in “Maine Pyar Kiya” (1989) that catapulted him to stardom. The film was a massive hit and established Salman as a leading actor in the industry.

Rise to Stardom

Throughout the 1990s, Salman starred in numerous successful films, including “Hum Aapke Hain Koun..!” (1994), “Karan Arjun” (1995), and “Biwi No.1” (1999). His on-screen charm and versatility won him a massive fan following. The 2000s saw him continue his reign with hits like “Tere Naam” (2003), “Mujhse Shaadi Karogi” (2004), and “Partner” (2007).

The Blockbuster Era

The 2010s marked a golden era in Salman’s career. He delivered a series of blockbuster films that shattered box office records, such as “Dabangg” (2010), “Ek Tha Tiger” (2012), “Kick” (2014), “Bajrangi Bhaijaan” (2015), and “Sultan” (2016). His larger-than-life screen presence and action-packed performances made him a favorite among audiences of all ages.

Philanthropy and Humanitarian Work

Apart from his acting career, Salman Khan is known for his philanthropic efforts. In 2007, he founded the “Being Human Foundation,” which focuses on education and healthcare for the underprivileged. The foundation has been instrumental in providing aid to thousands of people across India.

Salman Khan’s Net Worth

As of 2024, Salman Khan’s net worth is estimated to be around $360 million. His wealth comes from a combination of acting fees, brand endorsements, and his production company, Salman Khan Films (SKF). Salman is one of the highest-paid actors in Bollywood, charging between $10-20 million per film. Additionally, his popular reality TV show “Bigg Boss,” which he has been hosting since 2010, adds significantly to his income.

Real Estate and Assets

Salman owns several luxurious properties, including his Galaxy Apartments in Bandra, Mumbai, and a farmhouse in Panvel. He also has a collection of high-end cars and motorcycles, featuring brands like BMW, Audi, and Suzuki.

Future Projects

Salman Khan continues to be a dominant force in Bollywood with an exciting lineup of upcoming projects. Fans eagerly await his films, and he remains a major box office draw.

Conclusion

Salman Khan’s journey from a newcomer to a Bollywood superstar is a testament to his talent, hard work, and dedication. With a net worth of $360 million, he stands as one of the most influential and affluent actors in the Indian film industry. Beyond his cinematic achievements, his philanthropic work through the Being Human Foundation highlights his commitment to giving back to society. Salman Khan’s legacy as an actor and humanitarian will undoubtedly endure for generations to come.
